DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the study is to assess and compare the preliminary efficacy, safety and tolerability of fispemifene 300 mg and placebo given once daily for 8 weeks in the treatment of hypogonadal men with erectile dysfunction (ED) unresponsive to PDE5 inhibitors.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety Evaluating Fispemifene in the Treatment of Hypogonadal Men With Erectile Dysfunction Unresponsive to PDE5 Inhibitors
DOC.criteria: Hypogonadal (morning total testosterone levels ≤400 ng/dl) men age ≥20 with ED who are unresponsive to PDE5 inhibitors, as demonstrated by International Index of Erectile Function (IIEF) results for 28day lead in period.
